conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric conversion with clear wall height and interior volume exposed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D transformation with consistent wall geometry and clean cutaway.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout and wall positions are highly accurate. Slight simplification of door swing geometry compared to 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture corresponds well to the 2D layout. Bathroom fixtures (tub, toilet) and kitchen counters are correctly placed.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; materials are consistent and geometry is highly readable.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of door swing indicators compared to original architectural notations.

summary: A highly faithful 3D isometric conversion that maintains strict geometric alignment and interior detail with the original 2D floor plan.
